trans-unit.source: Represents the method that executes on a <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som körs på en <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When a managed thread is created, the method that executes on the thread is represented by a ThreadStart delegate or a <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate that is passed to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: När en hanterad tråd skapas den metod som körs på tråden representeras av en ThreadStart-delegat eller en <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>delegat som skickas till den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>

trans-unit.source: The thread does not begin executing until the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Tråden börjar inte körs förrän den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden anropas.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Execution begins at the first line of the method represented by the ThreadStart or <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Körningen börjar vid den första raden i metoden som representeras av ThreadStart eller <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>Delegera.</xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic and C# users can omit the ThreadStart or <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate constructor when creating a thread.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic och C#-användare kan utelämna ThreadStart eller <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>delegatkonstruktor när du skapar en tråd.</xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, use the `AddressOf` operator when passing your method to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A> constructor; for example, `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`.
trans-unit.target: I Visual Basic kan du använda den `AddressOf` operatorn när metoden att den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor, till exempel `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: In C#, simply specify the name of the thread procedure.
trans-unit.target: Ange namnet på tråden procedur i C#.

trans-unit.source: The compiler selects the correct delegate constructor.

[C++] > [!NOTE] > In version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, creating a ThreadStart delegate for a static method in C++ requires only one parameter: the address of the callback method, qualified by the class name.
trans-unit.target: [C++] > [!NOTE] > i version 2.0 av .NET Framework, skapar en ThreadStart-delegat för en statisk metod i C++ kräver endast en parameter: adressen Återanropsmetoden kvalificerat av klassnamnet.

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions two parameters were required when creating a delegate for a static method: zero (null) and the method address.
trans-unit.target: I tidigare versioner två parametrar behövde när du skapar ett ombud för en statisk metod: noll (null) och metoden-adress.

trans-unit.source: For an instance method, all versions require two parameters: the instance variable and the method address.
trans-unit.target: Alla versioner för en instansmetod kräver två parametrar: instans-variabeln och metoden-adress.
